name: THIEVE
description:
💚 💚 💚

Borrow things and gift them to those who want them more! What do you mean it's unethical?

Featuring:

  • Keyboard and controller support
  • 3D graphics (I swear!)
  • Hats
  • Timer (and pausing)
  • Score counter
  • A variety of items to never return!

Controls:

  • AWSD/Left Analog: Move
  • E/Circle/B: Thieve/Throw/Gift
  • Q/Cross/A: Use held item (if any action is available for it)

Game made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019 in less than 48 hours.
